Text:
First 3 episodes is compilation from original TV series "Body Story" (1998):
Body Snatchers = The Cold War + The Takeover
Breaking Down = Crash Repairs + Shut Down
The Beast Within = Under Pressure + Basic Instinct

Other 4 episodes is compilation from original TV series "Body Story-2" (2001):
Teen Dreams = Teen Dreams
Crash = Crash
Spreading Menace = Fat Attack + Bad Taste
Out of Control = Brave New World + Allergy
